title: Bitcoin Faces Selling Pressure as Investors Turn Cautious
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs market has shifted into a prolonged distribution phase , with capital moving away from accumulation. This transition has led to increased selling pressure, reflecting a shift in investor sentiment toward caution. Many market participants are now prioritizing liquidation over adding to their holdings, leading to downward pressure on Bitcoin's price. Recent data indicates that Bitcoin‚Äôs price structure has entered a phase typically seen after all-time highs. This phase follows the natural cycle of accumulation and distribution, where investors adjust their positions based on market trends. The latest distribution phase began in early 2025, coinciding with Bitcoin‚Äôs sharp correction. Investor activity further confirms this shift. All wallet size categories have contributed to the increased selling pressure , indicating that both large and small holders are actively reducing their positions. The impact of this trend has been particularly noticeable since mid-January, with a growing number of investors selling their assets at a loss, intensifying the market downturn. Market sentiment has also changed significantly. As uncertainty rises, investors have become more hesitant to increase their positions. Macroeconomic factors, including financial instability and trade tensions, have contributed to this cautious outlook. Earlier in the cycle, investors were actively buying Bitcoin during price pullbacks , expecting a continued uptrend. However, as liquidity tightened and risks increased, confidence in further accumulation declined. The lack of buying activity at lower levels suggests a capital rotation is taking place , leading to the possibility of a prolonged consolidation phase before the market finds stable ground. This means that Bitcoin could continue fluctuating until a strong support level is established. Despite these concerns, some analysts believe there are signs of stabilization. Observers have noted that the largest Bitcoin distribution by long-term holders in recent years appears to be tapering off. Selling activity from long-term holders has slowed , indicating a possible return to confidence among experienced investors. If this trend continues, it could lead to reduced market supply and potential stabilization. Bitcoin‚Äôs price remains volatile, with fluctuations driven by external economic and geopolitical factors. While the market faces uncertainty, signs of reduced selling pressure may suggest a possible shift in momentum . Whether this leads to a stronger recovery or an extended period of consolidation remains to be seen.

title: Bank Of Russia Proposes Allowing Select Investors To Trade Cryptocurrencies
body: Russia‚Äôs central bank has proposed allowing a limited group of Russian investors to buy and sell crypto assets like Bitcoin (BTC) under a new experimental legal regime. The apex bank seeks to establish standards for crypto-related services, boost market transparency, and expand investment opportunities for high-net-worth investors. 3-Year Experimental Regime For Crypto Investment In Russia On March 12, the Bank of Russia proposed allowing a ‚Äúlimited circle of Russian investors‚Äù to trade cryptocurrencies. The bank emphasized that the proposal is based on a directive from Russia‚Äôs president Vladimir Putin. ‚ÄúIn accordance with the instructions of the President of Russia, the Bank of Russia has sent proposals to the government for discussion on regulating investments in cryptocurrencies,‚Äù the announcement stated. A statement by the central bank says the plan would introduce an experimental legal regime lasting three years in which qualified investors would be allowed to conduct crypto transactions. Investors who wish to participate in the experimental framework must have over 100 million rubles ($1.14 million) in investments or an annual income of over 50 million rubles ($570,000). Notably, eligibility also extends to institutions that have already satisfied existing qualification standards under the current framework. The Bank of Russia‚Äôs rationale for introducing the new crypto program for select investors came from efforts to establish standards for crypto-related services and increase market transparency while expanding investment opportunities for ‚Äúexperienced investors willing to assume higher risks.‚Äù Bank Of Russia Maintains Ban On Retail Crypto Payments The Bank of Russia reiterated its warnings about the inherent volatility and risks of investing in cryptocurrencies, stressing that any jurisdiction does not guarantee these assets. ‚ÄúTherefore, investors, when deciding to invest in cryptocurrency, should be aware that they are taking on the risks of potential loss of their funds,‚Äù the bank added. Despite the proposal, the Bank of Russia noted that cryptocurrency transactions between residents outside the experimental legal regime are banned. The bank suggested enforcing penalties for violations of the experimental regime. Nonetheless, the move marks Russia‚Äôs latest foray into the crypto space. Last year, the country‚Äôs lower house of the Federal Assembly, known as the State Duma, passed two bills legalizing cryptocurrency mining and enforcing another experimental regime on cross-border settlements and foreign trading in crypto.

title: Alameda Moves Unstaked Solana to FTX-Linked Wallets, Market Unmoved
body: Alameda Research has unstaked a large amount of Solana tokens , transferring them to multiple FTX-associated addresses. Despite this significant move, Solana‚Äôs price and demand have remained largely unaffected. The crypto market‚Äôs overall bearish sentiment appears to overshadow the potential impact of these token shifts. On-chain data reveals that Alameda‚Äôs unstaked tokens were distributed among 38 wallets linked to FTX , continuing a pattern seen in previous asset transfers by the trading firm. Since its collapse, Alameda has frequently moved substantial amounts of various cryptocurrencies, often influencing prices. However, in this case, Solana‚Äôs price remained stable despite the movement of a large token supply. This stands in contrast to past events where Alameda‚Äôs asset transfers caused noticeable price fluctuations. For example, when the firm moved Ethereum earlier in 2024, ETH experienced a double-digit price jump. Yet, this latest Solana transaction had minimal impact on market dynamics, even as Solana briefly declined and then spiked before the announcement was made. The exact purpose behind these token transfers remains unclear. However, speculation suggests that Alameda may be reallocating assets as part of FTX‚Äôs ongoing reimbursement efforts . Last month, FTX began its first phase of creditor repayments, and earlier this month, the exchange unlocked another massive batch of Solana tokens. If Alameda‚Äôs transfers are connected to this process, they could play a role in restoring funds to affected users. Despite these movements, Solana‚Äôs demand is not expected to shift significantly. The broader crypto market is experiencing extreme fear, leading to substantial outflows from major assets. In this environment, Alameda‚Äôs actions represent just a small fraction of the overall market activity. While the situation continues to unfold, investors are closely watching for any further developments that could influence Solana‚Äôs price and demand. For now, it appears that market conditions and regulatory decisions will have a much larger effect on Solana than Alameda‚Äôs token transfers.

title: LIBRA Crypto Scandal: Lawyer Seeks Interpol Red Notice for Hayden Davis
body: The post LIBRA Crypto Scandal: Lawyer Seeks Interpol Red Notice for Hayden Davis appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The LIBRA crypto scandal in Argentina has taken another shocking turn, with lawyer Gregorio Dalbon pushing for the arrest of Hayden Davis, the man accused of being behind the failed project. Dalbon has formally requested an Interpol Red Notice, which would help locate and detain Davis in the U.S. before extraditing him to Argentina. He argues that Davis played a key role in the scandal and could flee due to his wealth and overseas residence. JUST IN: ARGENTINE LAWYER GREGORIO DALBON REQUESTED GLOBAL ACTION AGAINST HAYDEN DAVIS, URGING AN INTERPOL RED NOTICE AMID THE ONGOING $LIBRA TOKEN PROBE ‚Äî BSCN Headlines (@BSCNheadlines) March 13, 2025 The LIBRA Token Collapse & Its Political Fallout LIBRA was a Solana-based meme coin that gained huge attention, especially after Argentine President Javier Milei publicly endorsed it, as local media reported on March 11. However, the hype was short-lived, as the token‚Äôs value crashed within hours, wiping out millions in investor funds. The controversy didn‚Äôt just hit traders‚Äîit also put Milei‚Äôs administration under fire, with critics questioning whether he was part of the scheme or simply misled. Legal Battle Heats Up Dalbon, who has a history of high-profile cases, filed his request with Argentine prosecutor Eduardo Taiano and Judge Mar√≠a Servini. According to local media reports , he stressed Davis‚Äôs involvement in creating and promoting LIBRA, arguing that his freedom posed a serious risk. He accuses him of playing a key role in the scandal that caused massive losses for investors. He even argued in the filing that Davis posed a ‚Äúprocedural risk‚Äù if he is allowed to move freely, with huge financial backing, he could easily escape to the U.S. or go into hiding. Meanwhile, authorities have already taken action to freeze $100 million in crypto linked to the case. If Dalbon‚Äôs request is approved by Interpol, Davis could be arrested in any of the 195 member countries as per the Red Notice rules. However, it‚Äôs important to note that a Red Notice is not an automatic arrest warrant‚Äîeach country decides whether to act based on its own laws. What‚Äôs Next? The LIBRA scandal has rocked Argentina‚Äôs financial and political landscape. Investors lost millions, and the government is facing backlash over its handling of the situation. If Davis is arrested and extradited, it could mark a major step in holding those responsible accountable. But for now, the crypto community and legal experts are watching closely to see what happens next. Fraud allegations, rug-pull accusations , and even ties to President Milei‚Äîthis saga is far from over. However, this case will add a new chapter in the crypto history on how such high profile fraud cases should be handled in the future.

title: Revealing Insights: Tether CEO Reflects on Navigating US Crypto Regulation Challenges
body: In a candid address at the Cantor Global Technology Conference in New York, Tether‚Äôs CEO, Paolo Ardoino, offered a compelling reflection on the stablecoin giant‚Äôs arduous journey. Describing Tether‚Äôs experiences as going ‚Äúthrough hell,‚Äù as reported by CoinDesk, Ardoino‚Äôs words painted a vivid picture of the intense pressures and scrutiny faced by the leading stablecoin issuer, particularly from U.S. authorities. But what exactly are these challenges, and how has Tether navigated the complex landscape of crypto regulation ? Navigating the Labyrinth: Tether‚Äôs Crypto Challenges Under US Regulation Ardoino‚Äôs remarks shed light on the significant headwinds Tether encountered, primarily stemming from the watchful eyes of U.S. regulatory bodies. For years, Tether , the issuer of USDT, has operated under a cloud of skepticism and intense examination. This scrutiny wasn‚Äôt unfounded; the world of stablecoins, designed to maintain a steady value, was relatively new, and its potential impact on the broader financial system was still being understood. Let‚Äôs break down some key aspects of these crypto challenges : Regulatory Scrutiny: From its inception, Tether faced questions about the actual reserves backing its USDT stablecoin. Concerns were raised about whether each USDT was truly backed 1:1 by U.S. dollars or equivalent reserves, as initially claimed. This lack of transparency became a major point of contention with regulators. Legal Battles and Settlements: The pressure culminated in formal investigations and legal actions. Notably, Tether reached settlements with both the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) and the New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) in 2021. These settlements, while resolving specific issues, came with financial penalties and mandates for increased transparency and compliance. Maintaining Stability Amidst Volatility: Beyond regulatory hurdles, Tether also faced the inherent challenge of maintaining USDT‚Äôs peg to the US dollar in the volatile cryptocurrency market. Market fluctuations, especially during periods of high stress, can test the resilience of any stablecoin. Despite these formidable Tether challenges , Ardoino‚Äôs address suggests a turning tide. The settlements with the CFTC and NYDFS, while undoubtedly painful, have arguably paved the way for a more constructive relationship with U.S. regulators. Has Tether successfully weathered the storm and emerged stronger? From Scrutiny to Stability? Understanding US Regulation and Tether‚Äôs Evolution The settlements with the CFTC and NYDFS marked a significant juncture for Tether. These agreements required Tether to pay fines and, more importantly, to enhance its transparency and reporting practices. This shift towards greater openness is crucial for building trust and fostering a more positive regulatory environment. Here‚Äôs a closer look at the impact of US regulation on Tether: Regulatory Body Settlement Outcome Key Impact on Tether Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) $41 million penalty Settlement of charges related to untrue or misleading statements and unlawful off-exchange retail commodity transactions. New York State Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) $18.5 million penalty Settlement related to misrepresentations regarding USDT backing and concealment of losses. Required enhanced reporting and compliance measures. These settlements, while costly, can be viewed as a necessary step in Tether ‚Äòs maturation. By addressing past concerns and committing to greater transparency, Tether is signaling its intent to operate within the bounds of US regulation and build a sustainable future. This evolution is vital not only for Tether but also for the broader stablecoin ecosystem. USDT‚Äôs Reign: Dominance in the Stablecoin Market Despite the regulatory battles and operational hurdles, USDT has not only survived but thrived. Data from DefiLlama underscores USDT‚Äôs undisputed dominance in the stablecoin market . With a staggering market capitalization of $143.5 billion, USDT commands a 63% share of the total stablecoin market cap, which stands at $227.7 billion. This dominance speaks volumes about USDT‚Äôs utility and the market‚Äôs reliance on it as a key instrument in cryptocurrency trading and DeFi (Decentralized Finance). Why does USDT hold such a commanding position in the stablecoin market ? Several factors contribute to its enduring popularity: First-MMover Advantage: USDT was one of the earliest stablecoins, establishing a significant network effect and becoming deeply integrated into crypto exchanges and trading platforms. Liquidity and Accessibility: USDT boasts unparalleled liquidity across numerous exchanges, making it easily accessible for traders worldwide. Its widespread adoption makes it a convenient on-ramp and off-ramp for fiat currencies in the crypto space. Market Familiarity: Years of usage have ingrained USDT into the habits of crypto traders and investors. Despite controversies, its familiarity and ubiquity contribute to its continued preference. However, the stablecoin market is becoming increasingly competitive. Rivals like USDC, backed by Coinbase and Circle, are gaining ground, emphasizing regulatory compliance and transparency as core values. Will USDT be able to maintain its dominant position in the face of rising competition and evolving regulatory landscapes? The Road Ahead: What‚Äôs Next for Tether and the Stablecoin Ecosystem? Paolo Ardoino‚Äôs reflection at the Cantor Global Technology Conference offers a glimpse into Tether‚Äôs past, present, and potentially its future. The journey has been fraught with crypto challenges , particularly concerning US regulation . However, the settlements and the continued market dominance of USDT suggest a degree of resilience and adaptation. Looking ahead, several key factors will shape Tether‚Äôs trajectory and the broader stablecoin market : Evolving Regulation: The regulatory landscape for stablecoins is still in flux globally, especially in the US and Europe. Future regulations could significantly impact how stablecoins operate and are governed. Tether‚Äôs ability to proactively adapt to these changes will be crucial. Transparency and Trust: Continued commitment to transparency regarding reserves and operations will be essential for building and maintaining trust, both with regulators and the market. Competition from Rivals: The rise of competing stablecoins, particularly those emphasizing regulatory compliance, poses a significant challenge to USDT‚Äôs dominance. Innovation and differentiation will be key for Tether to stay ahead. Tether‚Äôs story is a microcosm of the broader cryptocurrency industry‚Äôs journey ‚Äì marked by innovation, rapid growth, regulatory scrutiny, and constant evolution. As the leading stablecoin , Tether‚Äôs future path will undoubtedly have a significant impact on the entire crypto ecosystem. Power Word: Revealing To learn more about the latest crypto regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto regulation institutional adoption.

title: Lazarus Group moves 400 ETH to Tornado Cash, expands malware campaign
body: North Korea‚Äôs Lazarus Group continues its crypto laundering operations, moving illicit funds while deploying new malware to target developers and steal digital assets. On Mar. 13, blockchain security firm CertiK detected a deposit of 400 Ethereum ( ETH ), worth around $750,000, to Tornado Cash. The transaction was traced back to Lazarus‚Äôs activity on the Bitcoin ( BTC ) network. The group has been linked to multiple high-profile hacks, including the $1.4 billion Bybit exploit in February. https://twitter.com/certikalert/status/1900010122044412187?s=46&t=nznXkss3debX8JIhNzHmzw Following the hack, the group concealed the stolen funds using a variety of techniques. To exchange and transfer large amounts of cryptocurrency, they used decentralized exchanges like THORChain ( RUNE ), which do not require identity checks. Reports show that in just five days, around $2.91 billion was moved through ThorChain, making it much harder to track and recover the money. You might also like: Crypto losses reached $1.53B in february, led by Bybit, Infini and zkLend exploits: Certik In another wave of cyber attacks, Lazarus Group has also launched six new malicious software packages on the Node Package Manager platform, a tool used by developers to manage and install JavaScript packages for their projects.¬†On Mar. 11, security firm Socket published a report on the malware, which is designed to steal credentials and crypto wallet data. The malware, including a package called BeaverTail, disguises itself as legitimate JavaScript libraries using typosquatting, where attackers slightly alter the names of trusted software to trick developers into downloading it. It primarily targets stored credentials in Chrome, Brave, and Firefox browsers, as well as Solana and Exodus wallets. Additionally, the group has been trying to trick crypto founders by using fake Zoom calls. Hackers pose as venture capitalists and send fake meeting links, claiming audio issues. When victims download a supposed fix, malware is installed. Security researchers have reported that several crypto founders have encountered these scams. According to Chainalysis, North Korean hackers stole over $1.3 billion in crypto across 47 attacks in 2024, more than double the amount stolen in 2023. Read more: –°rypto security breaches down nearly 40%, but hot wallet exploits persist

title: Tokyo-Listed Metaplanet Increases Bitcoin Stash To 3,050 BTC After Latest Purchase
body: Tokyo-based investment firm Metaplanet has doubled down on its aggressive Bitcoin accumulation strategy amid the crypto market bearishness , emulating the moves of Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy. Metaplanet Buys More Bitcoin Metaplanet announced the acquisition of 162 BTC for $13.3 million, in line with the company‚Äôs goal of acquiring 10,000 BTC by 2025 and 21,000 BTC by 2026 as part of its broader strategy to lead Japan‚Äôs Bitcoin renaissance. Metaplanet‚Äôs purchase, made at an average price of $83,123 per coin, brings its total Bitcoin holdings to 3,050 BTC, valued at around $249.4 million at current prices. The company‚Äôs stock rose by over 8% to 3,630 yen following the announcement of its Bitcoin acquisition, according to Yahoo Finance . Metaplanet has acquired 162 BTC for ~$13.5 million at ~$83,123 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 53.2% YTD 2025. As of 3/12/2025, we hold 3050 $BTC acquired for ~$253.7 million at ~$83,180 per bitcoin. pic.twitter.com/dTPkfNv70p ‚Äî Simon Gerovich (@gerovich) March 12, 2025 Metaplanet‚Äôs last purchase was made a week ago, when it bought 497 Bitcoin for $43.9 million. The firm has purchased almost 1,300 BTC in 2025 so far. These Bitcoin purchases reinforce its commitment to the foremost cryptocurrency. Despite BTC‚Äôs short-term drawdowns, the company remains optimistic about the asset‚Äôs future price action. Metaplanet‚Äôs CEO Simon Gerovich announced the company‚Äôs BTC yield performance for 2025 stood at 53.2%, well above its target of 35% yield per quarter. BTC yield refers to the percentage change in the ratio of total Bitcoin holdings to fully diluted shares outstanding. The firm‚Äôs endeavor to acquire Bitcoin for its holdings mirrors that of Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), with Metaplanet now owning over 0.01% of Bitcoin‚Äôs total circulating supply ‚Äî placing it among the top 13 largest corporate Bitcoin holders globally. In Asia, the firm trails only China-based poker game giant Boyaa Interactive, which currently holds 3,183 BTC. The company has adopted new financing strategies, as it unveiled a $745 million fundraising initiative in zero-discount moving strike warrants in ‚ÄúAsia‚Äôs largest-ever raise‚Äù to purchase Bitcoin.

if (listItems.length === 0) return; var anyActive = false; listItems.forEach(function(item) { var checkbox = item.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { if (checkbox.checked) { item.classList.add('active'); anyActive = true; // Set anyActive to true } else { item.classList.remove('active'); // Remove 'active' class if checkbox is unchecked } } }); // Update the button text based on whether any list item has the 'active' class updateButtonText(anyActive); } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); CoinPedia‚Äôs Ripple (XRP) Price Prediction With regulatory clarity from the SEC case and Ripple accelerating its expansion, we at CoinPedia are optimistic about XRP‚Äôs short-term outlook. title: VeChain Executive Urges Education to Overcome Bitcoin Reserve Bill Hurdles
body: Johnny Garcia stresses the need for better education on Bitcoin reserve bills, arguing that legislative resistance stems from a lack of understanding rather than outright rejection. While five states have dismissed the idea, 18 others continue to explore ways to integrate Bitcoin into their financial systems. Garcia believes that Bitcoin reserves could drive innovation, improve investment frameworks, and enhance financial transparency. He emphasized that many citizens remain skeptical about tax money funding crypto purchases , arguing that states must educate the public on the broader economic benefits of Bitcoin in reserve portfolios. The executive also pointed out that the blockchain industry must demonstrate real-world value beyond speculation. He urged crypto firms to develop solutions that address practical issues, making it harder for lawmakers to ignore their benefits. VeChain‚Äôs blockchain-based sustainability verification was cited as an example of how decentralized technology can tackle pressing global challenges. Despite recent state-level rejections, Garcia cautioned against interpreting these decisions as widespread opposition to Bitcoin reserves. He highlighted that several states rejected the bills by narrow margins, suggesting that further discussion and education could shift opinions in the future. As the debate continues at the state level, momentum is also building on a national scale. Senator Lummis has reintroduced the BITCOIN Act, aiming to establish a US Strategic Bitcoin Reserve , backed by a significant BTC acquisition over five years. Originally proposed in 2024, the bill failed to pass, but recent policy shifts and executive orders suggest renewed interest in integrating Bitcoin into national financial strategies. While the future of Bitcoin reserves remains uncertain, increasing public awareness and addressing legislative concerns could play a crucial role in shaping the next phase of digital asset adoption. With growing interest in blockchain‚Äôs real-world applications, the conversation around Bitcoin as a reserve asset is far from over.

title: GnosisDAO‚Äôs Bold $4.8M Injection: Powering Up Decentralized VPN Development
body: In a move signaling a strong commitment to online privacy and decentralized technologies, GnosisDAO, a prominent decentralized autonomous organization, has just given a massive thumbs up to bolster the development of its VPN project. Think of it as a significant power-up for digital freedom! This latest decision involves a substantial crypto funding injection of $4.8 million, building upon an initial investment and highlighting GnosisDAO‚Äôs belief in the future of secure, private internet access. But what exactly does this mean for you, the crypto enthusiast, and the wider digital world? Let‚Äôs dive into the details of this exciting development. Why is GnosisDAO Doubling Down on VPN Development? GnosisDAO isn‚Äôt new to the world of decentralized technologies. Known for its innovative approach and contributions to the blockchain space, GnosisDAO‚Äôs increased investment in VPN development speaks volumes about the growing importance of online privacy. In an age where data breaches and surveillance are increasingly common concerns, the need for robust and user-centric VPN solutions has never been greater. This isn‚Äôt just about hiding your browsing history; it‚Äôs about reclaiming digital sovereignty and ensuring a more secure and open internet for everyone. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of why this investment is a big deal: Privacy is Paramount: With increasing online surveillance and data collection, users are actively seeking tools to protect their digital footprint. A decentralized VPN offers a compelling alternative to traditional VPN services, promising greater transparency and control. Decentralization as a Core Value: GnosisDAO operates on the principles of decentralization. Extending this ethos to VPN technology aligns perfectly with their mission to build a more distributed and resilient digital ecosystem. Synergy with HOPR: The collaboration with HOPR, a leading mixnet developer, brings specialized expertise to the project. HOPR‚Äôs focus on metadata privacy complements GnosisDAO‚Äôs vision for a comprehensive decentralized solution. Long-Term Vision: This isn‚Äôt a short-sighted venture. The additional funding demonstrates GnosisDAO‚Äôs long-term commitment to establishing a viable and impactful decentralized VPN solution within the crypto space and beyond. The Journey So Far: From Seed Funding to Substantial Investment The Gnosis VPN project isn‚Äôt starting from scratch. It began in 2024 with an initial seed investment of $1.5 million from GnosisDAO. This initial capital injection was crucial in laying the groundwork and producing a proof of concept for the Gnosis VPN. Think of it as the initial spark that ignited a promising fire. This early phase allowed the teams at Gnosis and HOPR to: Validate the Concept: Prove the feasibility of a decentralized VPN solution within the Gnosis ecosystem. Establish Collaboration: Forge a strong working relationship between GnosisDAO and HOPR developers. Develop a Proof of Concept: Create a functional prototype to showcase the potential of the Gnosis VPN. The success of this initial phase has paved the way for the much larger $4.8 million investment. This significant increase in crypto funding is a testament to the project‚Äôs early promise and GnosisDAO‚Äôs confidence in its future impact. What Will the New Funding Actually Be Used For? So, where exactly will this $4.8 million go? It‚Äôs not just about throwing money at a problem; it‚Äôs about strategic allocation to ensure maximum impact. The funds are earmarked for several key areas crucial to the successful development and launch of the Gnosis VPN: Technical Research: Deeper exploration into advanced VPN technologies, protocol optimizations, and security enhancements. This ensures the Gnosis VPN is not just functional but also cutting-edge and resilient against evolving threats. User Onboarding Solutions: Making the VPN accessible and user-friendly is paramount for widespread adoption. A portion of the funding will focus on developing intuitive interfaces and streamlined onboarding processes, ensuring even non-technical users can easily benefit from decentralized privacy. HOPR Network Expansion: A robust and geographically diverse network is essential for a high-performance VPN. Expanding the HOPR Network infrastructure will improve speed, reliability, and global coverage of the Gnosis VPN. Furthermore, the agreement includes a strategic element that benefits GnosisDAO in the long run. Gnosis has secured the right to purchase HOPR tokens at a 30% discounted price. This not only represents a potential financial upside but also further aligns the incentives of both GnosisDAO and the HOPR Network , fostering a stronger and more collaborative partnership. Benefits of a Decentralized VPN: Why Should You Care? You might be wondering, ‚ÄúWhy should I care about a decentralized VPN?‚Äù Good question! The traditional VPN market is already quite saturated. However, decentralized VPNs offer some unique and compelling advantages, particularly for those invested in the crypto and Web3 space: Feature Traditional VPN Decentralized VPN (like Gnosis VPN) Transparency Often opaque, with limited insight into server infrastructure and data handling. Built on open-source principles, with greater transparency in network operations and data flows. Censorship Resistance Centralized infrastructure can be targeted by authorities for censorship or shutdown. Distributed nature makes it significantly harder to censor or shut down the entire network. Data Privacy Reliance on a single entity that controls servers and potentially user data. Data is distributed across a network, reducing the risk of centralized data breaches and single points of failure. Trust Model Requires trust in the VPN provider‚Äôs claims about privacy and security. Trust is distributed across the network and verifiable through blockchain and cryptographic principles. Economic Incentives Users pay subscription fees to a centralized provider. Potentially integrates crypto-economic models to incentivize node operators and reward users, creating a more sustainable and community-driven ecosystem. For crypto users, who often prioritize decentralization and privacy in their financial activities, a decentralized VPN like the Gnosis VPN could become an indispensable tool. It aligns with the core values of the crypto space and offers a more robust and resilient approach to online privacy. Challenges Ahead for Gnosis VPN Development While the future looks bright for Gnosis VPN, it‚Äôs important to acknowledge the challenges that lie ahead in its VPN development journey. Building a successful decentralized VPN is not without its hurdles: Scalability: Ensuring the VPN can handle a large number of users and maintain high speeds is a significant technical challenge. Decentralized networks can sometimes face scalability limitations compared to centralized systems. Performance Optimization: Balancing decentralization with optimal VPN performance (speed, latency) requires careful engineering and ongoing optimization. User Education and Adoption: Educating users about the benefits of decentralized VPNs and encouraging adoption will be crucial for the project‚Äôs success. Many users are already familiar with traditional VPNs, so highlighting the unique advantages of a decentralized approach is key. Regulatory Landscape: The regulatory environment surrounding VPNs and decentralized technologies is constantly evolving. Navigating these complexities and ensuring compliance will be an ongoing consideration. However, with the substantial crypto funding now secured and the expertise of both GnosisDAO and HOPR teams, the project is well-positioned to tackle these challenges head-on. The Bottom Line: A Powerful Step Towards Decentralized Privacy GnosisDAO‚Äôs $4.8 million investment in Gnosis VPN development is more than just a financial transaction; it‚Äôs a bold statement about the future of online privacy and the power of decentralized technologies. By doubling down on this project, GnosisDAO is not only contributing to the growth of the HOPR Network and the broader decentralized ecosystem but also taking a significant step towards empowering individuals with greater control over their digital lives. As the project progresses, it will be fascinating to watch how Gnosis VPN shapes the landscape of online privacy and sets a new standard for decentralized solutions in the crypto world and beyond. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption.

title: Bitcoin‚Äôs Mining Difficulty Rises Despite Market Drop‚ÄîWhat Does It Mean?
body: Bitcoin is beginning to show signs of a potential reversal after experiencing a prolonged bearish trend. Although the cryptocurrency remains below $85,000, it has recorded a 2.6% increase, with its price currently at $83,510. Despite this short-term uptick, Bitcoin is still down by roughly 7.5% over the past week, reflecting a continued downtrend. Regardless of¬†Bitcoin‚Äôs price struggles to regain higher levels, CryptoQuant analyst Avocado Onchain has identified a notable trend in BTC mining activity. Related Reading: Bitcoin‚Äôs SOPR Nears Critical Level‚ÄîIs a Deeper Correction Ahead? Rising Bitcoin Mining Difficulty and Miner Holding Strategy According to Avocado Onchain, Bitcoin‚Äôs mining difficulty has remained in an uptrend even as the market undergoes a 30% correction. The analyst wrote: During the extended correction phase that began in March 2024, mining difficulty saw a temporary drop, leading some to speculate that it resembled the end of the 2021 cycle. However, contrary to those predictions, Bitcoin‚Äôs price rebounded sharply. Although it is now undergoing a ~30% correction, mining difficulty continues to climb. Historically, a decline in mining difficulty has been associated with miners shutting down less efficient rigs, which often signals broader market distress. However, current data, according to Avocado suggests that miners have not yet begun offloading large amounts of Bitcoin, indicating that they are holding onto their reserves rather than selling at lower prices. Another key metric Avocado pointed out is the Miner Position Index (MPI). Previously, this metric showed signs of selling pressure in November 2024. However, this activity did not lead to a significant market downturn, according to the CryptoQuant analyst. Instead, miners appear to be maintaining a holding strategy, suggesting that the broader uptrend remains intact. If Bitcoin‚Äôs correction extends further, a decrease in mining difficulty could be a potential indicator of miner capitulation, but as of now, the network remains resilient. Stablecoin Transfers and Market Absorption In a separate analysis, CryptoQuant analyst Mignolet has observed a surge in the total amount of stablecoin transfers, a trend that typically does not occur while Bitcoin‚Äôs price is declining but rather after a drop, during a market consolidation phase. This suggests that large-scale investors could be absorbing market shocks through over-the-counter (OTC) transactions, reducing the impact of further price declines. Mignolet also noted that increased activity in stablecoin transfers, combined with a rise in active Bitcoin addresses, signals heightened network participation. This pattern has historically indicated spot accumulation, which can serve as a precursor to price recoveries. Related Reading: Bitcoin Drops Below 200-Day MA ‚Äì Next Key Support Lies At $66K According To Mayer Multiple If accumulation continues while sentiment remains low, the market could enter a phase where a short squeeze forces a rapid upward price movement in Bitcoin. Featured image created with DALL-E, Chart from TradingView

title: Solana Community Flags High Centralization Risk in Proposed Upgrade
body: A section of the Solana community has criticized the SIMD-228 proposal, citing high centralization risk. The proposal seeks to reduce the asset inflation rate by 80% by moving from a fixed-rate token emission to a market-based model. Over the past week, mixed views circulated on digital asset spaces. At the time of writing, proponents have secured the necessary quorum (71.85%) in favor. Validators Lambast Possible Risks Crypto enthusiast Dave wrote on X that the move will favor larger validators over smaller players. He added that this will lead to high centralization and a scenario where the rich get richer. Solana validator SolBlaze.org noted that SIMD-0228 threatens Solana‚Äôs decentralization and the wider ecosystem. While it sounds good in theory, presently, the fixed 15% inflation decrease will be taken to extreme levels. According to the validator, rewards will plunge up to 80% with users looking for better yield. This reduced stake affects network security and disproportionately affects small validators. These network participants at 0% interest maintain servers and get block fees. Furthermore, Solana Foundation President Lily Liu described the proposal as half-baked, pointing to the benefits of a predictable capital market. She added that infrastructure remains the foundation of most networks and needs a certain level of stability. ‚Äú What‚Äôs the greater risk and cost to our ecosystem: overpaying for security, or underinvesting in growth? On security: we were dogged for years as the centralized VC chain. We finally overcame that. But now we have 228 which is a VC proposal that centralizes the network! On growth: we‚Äôve achieved impressive growth ‚Äì and we need to continue to invest. Other ecosystems have noticed our ascent and are gearing up to compete,‚Äù Lui wrote. Solana‚Äôs Co-founder Backs The Proposal Solana‚Äôs co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko backed the proposal, allaying the decentralization concerns. In an X post, he explained that the cost of inflation hitting $1-$2 billion annually will spark losses for small validators and wealth managers. Another argument for the proposal is the incentive for participation to secure the network while inflation drops. Per the release , higher inflation drives centralization. On the other hand, low inflation fuels Solana‚Äôs decentralized finance ( DeFi ) presence. ‚Äú Additionally, a high staking rate can be viewed as unhealthy for new DeFi protocols, since it means the implied hurdle rate is the inflation cost. Lowering the ‚Äúrisk-free‚Äù inflation rate creates stimulative conditions and allows new protocols to grow.‚Äù

} } }, error: function(xhr, status, error) { console.error('Error:', error); } }); } function logSelectedSubscriptions(categoryid) { var unsubscribemodal = document.querySelector('.unsubscribed-popup-modal .modal'); title: LBank‚Äôs $100 Million Futures Risk Protection Fund: What It Means for Traders As Bitcoin Drops Under $83k
body: LBank, a global crypto exchange recognized for its high liquidity and customer-focused programs, has set up a $100 million Futures Risk Protection Fund. This plan aims to guard traders from extreme market swings giving them a more steady and safe trading experience. But how does this fund help the typical crypto trader at a time when Bitcoin has dropped under $83k? Understanding LBank‚Äôs Futures Risk Protection Fund Price swings are a normal part of crypto trading, and quick price jumps can lead to forced sell-offs that put traders at a loss. LBank‚Äôs new fund tries to fight these sudden market shifts, giving users money protection when they face losses due to big price changes. The fund kicks in during what LBank calls ‚Äúwick events‚Äù ‚Äì times when the K-line price moves more than 2% away from the fair market price in just one minute before bouncing back. The protection covers the top 100 futures trading pairs, including Bitcoin (BTC) , Ethereum (ETH) , and Solana (SOL) making sure it includes a wide range of high-liquidity assets. How Traders Benefit Compensation for Losses ‚Äì Traders affected by forced liquidation or stop-loss triggers due to price spikes will receive 120% of their losses. This compensation is credited in USDT to their spot accounts within 48 hours, reducing the financial strain caused by sudden market movements. Additional Airdrop Rewards ‚Äì In addition to individual compensation, LBank will allocate an extra 10,000 USDT whenever a price spike occurs. This amount is proportionally distributed to all position holders of the affected trading pair, further rewarding active traders. Market Stability and Trust ‚Äì LBank‚Äôs creation of this fund shows its dedication to fair trading and market integrity. This move helps lower the risks linked to rapid trading and sudden market changes What Sets This Fund Apart? Unlike traditional insurance mechanisms, LBank‚Äôs approach ensures rapid and transparent settlements using USDT, simplifying the process for traders. With over 15 million users worldwide, the platform is leveraging its strong market presence to introduce a safety net that enhances user confidence and trading continuity. Moreover, by integrating data from the top five derivatives platforms listed on CoinMarketCap, LBank ensures that compensation decisions are based on market-wide consensus rather than internal pricing models. This level of transparency sets a new standard in risk protection for futures traders. The Bigger Picture: A Safer Futures Market While there are several hacks happening across the globe as the hype around top cryptos like Bitcoin and the rest intensifies, crypto futures trading also has major risks. Nonetheless, steps like LBank‚Äôs $100 million safety fund help lessen the effects of sudden market shifts. As more exchanges look into ways to handle risk, traders can expect a safer and more stable trading scene. For those actively engaged in futures trading, LBank‚Äôs latest move is a game-changer-offering not just protection, but also incentives that turn market volatility into an opportunity rather than a setback. As crypto markets continue to evolve, trader-first innovations like this could define the next phase of responsible trading. The post LBank‚Äôs $100 Million Futures Risk Protection Fund: What It Means for Traders As Bitcoin Drops Under $83k appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Chainlink Whale Sells 356K Coins Sparking Concerns; Can LINK Price Hit $45?
body: A Chainlink whale sent shockwaves across the crypto market on Thursday, selling massive amounts despite a price relief. On-chain data indicated that 356,665 coins were sold recently, a converse action to the current market cool-down. In response, traders and investors speculate whether it is possible for LINK price to hit $45 ahead, as the coin is already up 2% in the past 24 hours despite the selloff. Chainlink Whale Selloff: 356K Token Dump Ignites Caution According to an X post by Onchain Lens on March 13, a Chainlink whale sold 356,665 coins for $4.59 million USDC at an average price of $12.88. Per the data, the whale address ‚Äò0xc6f7f‚Äô was recorded as making the selloff transaction. For context, colossal selloffs by whales signal a loss of confidence in an asset‚Äôs potential for gains. In turn, traders and investors reckon a poor market performance ahead. Besides, it‚Äôs also noteworthy that the sell order may be due to a panic-selling sentiment prevailing across the market at present. Traders and investors reflect a cautious approach to risk assets amid severe macro heat. Nevertheless, the Chainlink whale still holds 7,693 LINK tokens, worth $101,533. The undermined existing holding indicates that the trader may not be confident about gains ahead but still hopes for a best-case scenario wherein the price recovers from the broader volatility. Crypto Market Today However, the crypto market appears to be easing pressure as the latest U.S. CPI data revealed cooling inflation. In turn, BTC and major-league altcoins prevented further downside price risk today. Simultaneously, LINK price also eased up, witnessing slight intraday gains and reflecting resilience. Yet, market participants remain uncertain over future movements as the selloff indicates a dip while broader developments could conversely uplift the market sentiment. LINK Price Soars Despite Whale Selloff As of press time, LINK price witnessed gains worth 2% intraday and closed at $13.15. It bottomed and peaked at $12.82 and $13.77 over the past day. The coin is currently rising in sync with today‚Äôs broader crypto market trend. Top Analyst Weighs Bullish Remarks On Chainlink Simultaneously, renowned market analyst ‚ÄòBitcoin Buddha‚Äô took to X, projecting bullishness over future movements despite the massive selloff. As per the analyst‚Äôs post and price chart, Chainlink ‚Äúseems to be recovering after testing support near $12.‚Äù This paves the way for further gains and thus, a new ATH if recovery sustains, per the analyst. Source: Bitcoin Buddha, X On the other hand, a LINK price prediction by CoinGape revealed that the technical chart on the token‚Äôs weekly time frame shows a bullish engulfing pattern. This formation suggests a strong momentum that favors buyers. Overall, the abovementioned dynamics indicated that the coin could pump ahead despite the massive selloff. On the other hand, another report revealed that a $45 price target remains possible as long as Chainlink holds a key support zone between $6 and $9. Crypto market traders and investors continue to thoroughly monitor the token amid broader trends impacting the market. The post Chainlink Whale Sells 356K Coins Sparking Concerns; Can LINK Price Hit $45? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Pi Network (Pi) Price Shocker: 15% Daily Surge, ATH Soon?
body: TL;DR Pi Network‚Äôs token has rebounded from recent lows and outperformed major cryptocurrencies like BTC and XRP in daily gains. Analysts predict further upside potential. Speculation is mounting about a potential Binance listing on March 14, while Gemini has hinted at a major announcement on March 13, fueling anticipation within the PI community. PI Outperforms the Leaders Pi Network‚Äôs native token saw the light of day on February 20, and since then, it has experienced significant volatility. The price surpassed $1.80 on launch day, but it tanked below $0.65 mere days later. The bulls retook control towards the end of February, and the valuation hit an all-time high of almost $3. The ongoing month has offered more turbulence, with PI dipping below $1.30 on March 9. However, that marked a local bottom, and currently, the price is worth approximately $1.70 (per CoinGecko‚Äôs data), representing a 15% increase on a daily scale. PI Price, Source: CoinGecko The coin‚Äôs resurgence coincides with a slight rebound of the entire cryptocurrency market. However, PI has outperformed most of the top 100 digital assets in terms of daily gains. Bitcoin (BTC), for instance, is up 2% for the day, whereas Ripple (XPR) has climbed by 3% for that timeframe. According to some industry participants, PI has much more room for growth. The X user JAVON MARKS recently claimed that the price chart seems to have formed ‚Äúa bullish Falling Wedge pattern breakout‚Äù that might be followed by a bull run to fresh peaks. ‚ÄúPrices could be set for an over 72% increase back close to the $3 mark,‚Äù the analyst predicted. The Approaching Pi Day Pi Network will celebrate its sixth birthday on March 14 . The date also symbolizes the mathematical constant œÄ (pi), which is approximately 3.14. Recently, there have been increased rumors that Binance might list PI that day. In February, the world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange held a community vote to determine whether its users would want to see PI available for trading. Over 86% of the voters clicked the ‚Äúyes‚Äù option, but PI remains unavailable on the platform. A potential listing will increase the coin‚Äôs liquidity and accessibility and could trigger upward pressure on the price. Historically, support from Binance has resulted in substantial rallies for the involved cryptocurrencies. Meanwhile, the US-based crypto exchange Gemini might also hop on the bandwagon. Earlier this week, the company prepared the community for big news that is about to be announced on March 13 . Some users commenting on the post suggested that the listing of PI could be the upcoming development. The well-known exchanges that have already embraced Pi Network‚Äôs native token include Bitget, Gate.io, MEXC, OKX, and more. The post Pi Network (Pi) Price Shocker: 15% Daily Surge, ATH Soon? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: XRP Price Gearing Up as the Ripple vs. SEC Lawsuit is Nearing Resolution‚ÄîWill it Reach $10 in 2025?
body: The post XRP Price Gearing Up as the Ripple vs. SEC Lawsuit is Nearing Resolution‚ÄîWill it Reach $10 in 2025? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto markets have shown some resilience in the past 24 hours, with Bitcoin and XRP leading the charge. Although the BTC price managed to reclaim levels above $83,000, the real excitement lies around the XRP price. The token has demonstrated a strong comeback after visiting lows below $2, which manifests growing bullish momentum around the token. One of the major reasons for the downfall of the XRP price , which also restricted the rally from marking a new ATH during the 2021 bull run, was the ongoing lawsuit against Ripple. The delisting from the US-based exchanges has made some of the market participants uncertain over the next price action. Meanwhile, the price could trigger a strong bullish action soon as some reports suggest these uncertain clouds over Ripple are expected to fade away. As per some insider reports, the case is in the process of wrapping up. We have seen the SEC closing the investigation and lawsuits over various crypto platforms in the past couple of weeks. And the delay with Ripple is speculated to be over the fine of $125 million imposed by the SEC and the permanent injunction preventing the company from selling XRP to institutional investors. Despite the bullish sentiments surrounding it, the XRP price is facing some bearish pressure as it fails to surpass pivotal resistance after a rebound. The latest rebound, however, invalidated the H&S pattern, but the price failed to rise above $2.28, which raises some concerns. Meanwhile, the RSI is incremental regardless of a minor divergence. On the other hand, the Ichimoku cloud is preparing for a bullish crossover and as a result, the price is expected to maintain a range-bound consolidation between $2.03 and $2.27. Once the price rises above the range, it may continue to test the higher targets. With the speculation of the closure of the Ripple vs. SEC lawsuit, the traders are expected to become optimistic over the next price action. Besides, the platform is creating a DFSA license to enable blockchain-powered crypto payments while Franklin Templeton joins the race for XRP ETF along with Grayscale, Wisdomtree, etc. and others. Therefore, these external factors are expected to impact the XRP price, which may soar high and reach a 2-digit figure soon.

title: Europeans show little interest in digital euro, ECB study reveals
body: European consumers have shown minimal interest in adopting a central bank digital currency (CBDC), raising concerns for the European Central Bank (ECB) as it prepares for a potential rollout of the digital euro. An ECB working paper on ‚ÄúConsumer attitudes towards a central bank digital currency,‚Äù which surveyed about 19,000 respondents across 11 euro-area countries, highlighted significant communication challenges that are discouraging European households from adopting the digital euro. When asked to hypothetically allocate 10,000 euros (roughly $10,800) across various assets, Europeans allocated only a small portion to the digital euro, having little impact on traditional liquid assets like cash, current accounts or savings accounts. Reasons for not adopting a digital euro for retail payments. Source: European Central Bank According to the March 12 ECB working paper, Europeans have a strong preference for existing payment methods and see no real benefit in a new type of payment system amid myriads of offline and online alternatives: ‚ÄúThis finding also suggests that convincing some users of the value added of a CBDC might pose a challenge for policymakers, and more research will certainly be needed in this area.‚Äù The study suggested that while a digital euro could be introduced with minimal disruption to financial stability, its adoption faces significant hurdles due to consumer habits. Additionally, it stressed the importance of targeted communication to address persistent consumer reluctance toward a digital euro. Post-treatment attention checks conducted on European respondents. Source: ECB The ECB paper found that European consumers were receptive to video-based education and training and concluded that educating the masses with CBDC-related video information could help with the widespread adoption of the digital euro: ‚ÄúWe find evidence that consumers who are shown a short video providing concise and clear communication about the key features of the digital euro are substantially more likely to update their beliefs about this new form of payment, which, in turn, increases their immediate likelihood of adopting it compared to an untreated control group.‚Äù Related: European lawmakers silent on US Bitcoin reserve amid digital euro push The study‚Äôs release comes as US lawmakers intensify their opposition to CBDCs. Speaking at the House Financial Services Committee hearing on March 11, Representative Tom Emmer said Congress should ‚Äúprioritize pro-stablecoin legislation alongside anti-CBDC legislation.‚Äù Emmer speaks during the House Financial Services Committee Hearing on CBDCs. Source: emmer.house.gov Emmer said, ‚ÄúCBDC technology is inherently un-American‚Äù and unelected officials should not be allowed to issue it. Emmer also reintroduced the CBDC Anti-Surveillance State Act , which would prevent future US administrations from launching CBDCs. Meanwhile, Deutsche B√∂rse CEO Stephan Leithner recently called for the establishment of a permanent digital euro , among other reforms, to strengthen the region‚Äôs financial autonomy. title: FTX/Alameda redeems 185k SOL today, totaling 7.845m SOL ($1.00878 B) since Nov 2023
body: Arkham Intelligence has revealed that FTX/Alameda redeemed 185,328 SOL from staking a few hours ago. The now-defunct company also distributed approximately $22.89 million in digital assets to 38 addresses. The firm noted that the addresses often transferred most of the SOL tokens to Coinbase and Binance. FTX/Alameda has cumulatively transferred 7.845M Solana since November 2023, valued at approximately $1.00878 billion. FTX/Alameda redeems 185K SOL today ARKHAM ALERT: ALAMEDA ADDRESS JUST UNSTAKED $23M SOL TO 38 NEW ADDRESSES An FTX/Alameda Staking address received $22.9M SOL from a staking address unlock and has just distributed these funds to 37 addresses that have previously received SOL from this address. These addresses‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/9eWuKAY4na ‚Äî Arkham (@arkham) March 12, 2025 The collapsed crypto company FTX/Alameda has unstaked and distributed 185,328 SOL (roughly $23M) to 38 FTX-linked addresses on March 13. The firm has cumulatively redeemed a total of 7.845 million SOL (approximately $1.01B) since November 2023. ‚ÄúAn FTX/Alameda staking address received $22.9M SOL from a staking address unlock and has just distributed these funds to 37 addresses that have previously received SOL from this address.‚Äù ‚Äì Arkham Intelligence FTX/Alameda executed its monthly withdrawal of 185K SOL at an average transfer price of $128 per SOL. The price of Solana is currently exchanging hands at $124.06 at the time of publication, a 1.71% surge in the last 24 hours. The impact of the withdrawals saw a slight dip in SOL‚Äôs price by 1.2% within the first hour, plummeting to $122.25 at 11:30 a.m. UTC. Dex Screener also revealed that the dip can be attributed to the sell pressure from the virtual assets being moved to exchanges. The analytic firm noted that trading volumes on Solana-based decentralized exchanges (DEXs) surged by 15% within the same timeframe. DEXs recorded a total of $450 million in SOL trading volume. Binance highlighted that its stablecoin SOL/USDT also realized a 20% surge in trading volume, with 1.2 million Solana stated in the hour following the withdrawal announcement. Coinbase also noted that the SOL/BTC pair experienced a 10% increase in volume, totaling 800,000 SOL traded. On-chain data from Arkham Intelligence also revealed that the address that received the unstaked crypto currently held 5.502 million SOL, approximately $693.8 million. FTX/Alameda has unstaked and distributed huge amounts of virtual assets on several occasions. The firm‚Äôs bankruptcy address once staked $10 million in MATIC tokens in late 2023 and moved Ethereum worth $14.75 million in early 2024. FTX/Alameda commences creditor repayments The company has not yet said what it‚Äôs planning to do with these unlocked virtual currencies. FTX kicked off the first round of creditor repayments in February but said the process will be long and customers should expect to receive funds within 1 to 3 business days. Former FTX users began reporting last month that their repayments were finally coming in. The firm said that the users will get reimbursed based on the value of their tokens in 2022, with an attached interest rate. The interest rate would be lower than their rate of growth, which was meant to encourage future investment. The collapsed crypto exchange also unstaked tokens worth $1.57 billion earlier this month. It announced that its anticipated record date for the next distribution will be April 11, 2025. The firm stated that the next distribution will be for holders of allowed claims of FTX‚Äôs Class 5 Customer Entitlement Claims and Class 6 General Unsecured Claims as defined in its plan. FTX also noted that the next date for Convenience Claims that had become allowed since the initial record date and had not received their distribution was also set for April 11. The company added that the next distribution will commence on May 30, 2025. Plan Administrator of the FTX Recovery Trust, John J. Ray III, highlighted that they were pleased to commence initial distributions and set the timeline for their next distribution. He acknowledged that FTX appreciated its customers and creditors‚Äô patience and collaboration throughout the process. Ray also added that ‚Äúour work is not over ‚Äì we intend to continue our recovery efforts and return funds to additional claim classes.‚Äù The exchange maintained that the Initial Distributions will only be made to holders of allowed claims that have met required pre-distribution requirements. FTX also urged its customers and creditors to continue completing their Know Your Customer (KYC) verification and onboard with BitGo and Kraken to receive a distribution. title: XRP Healthcare Expands into Africa with Major Acquisition
body: XRP Healthcare , a pioneering entity in healthcare innovation, has officially acquired Pharma Ville , a prominent retail and wholesale pharmacy chain in Uganda. This strategic move marks XRP Healthcare‚Äôs inaugural foray into Africa‚Äôs growing healthcare sector, setting the stage for scalable, technology-driven pharmaceutical distribution across the continent. The acquisition strengthens XRP Healthcare‚Äôs mission to revolutionize healthcare accessibility in high-growth markets, particularly in regions where pharmaceutical infrastructure remains underdeveloped. Pharma Ville‚Äôs Established Presence in Uganda Pharma Ville operates two retail pharmacies and five wholesale distribution centers strategically located across Uganda. This established infrastructure significantly enhances medicine accessibility nationwide, reinforcing XRP Healthcare‚Äôs ability to streamline pharmaceutical supply chains and expand its footprint in Africa‚Äôs healthcare market. The company plays a pivotal role in Uganda‚Äôs healthcare sector, collaborating closely with the National Medical Stores (NMS) and Joint Medical Stores (JMS) to ensure a steady and reliable supply of essential medicines. The acquisition encompasses 60 registered pharmaceutical products, 18 products ready for immediate commercialization, and 70 additional products in the pipeline awaiting regulatory approval. BIG NEWS XRP Healthcare has successfully acquired Pharma Ville, a retail and wholesale pharmacy chain with 7 locations across Uganda, marking our official entry into Africa‚Äôs healthcare industry. This strategic acquisition reinforces our commitment to expanding into‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/8RfUBtmlWT ‚Äî XRP Healthcare (@XRPHealthcare) March 12, 2025 Strengthening the Supply Chain Through Global Partnerships The acquisition also brings with it Pharma Ville‚Äôs extensive distribution network, which includes partnerships with eight global pharmaceutical suppliers. Among these are Toros Group from Switzerland, specializing in orthopedic supplies; Ascensia Switzerland from Germany, focused on diabetic care solutions; Incepta Pharmaceuticals Ltd from Bangladesh, known for its human drug portfolio; and Amanta Health Care Limited from India, a supplier of intravenous fluids. Additional partners include Forans Latvia from Latvia, Mediteks from Turkey, Naari Pharma Pvt Limited from India, and Universal Corporation Limited from Kenya, all contributing to Pharma Ville‚Äôs broad pharmaceutical and medical supply chain. These collaborations will enable XRP Healthcare to leverage an already robust supply network while implementing new technologies to further improve distribution efficiency. Leadership Perspectives on the Acquisition Richard Kitonsa, Founder and CEO of Pharma Ville, emphasized the transformative impact of this acquisition, stating that joining XRP Healthcare will enable the company to scale operations rapidly, introduce innovative technologies, and better serve Uganda‚Äôs healthcare needs. Whitney Lynn, Chairman of XRP Healthcare, reinforced the company‚Äôs broader mission, explaining that their primary goal is to make essential medicines more accessible and affordable. This acquisition is a major step in achieving that vision. Kain Roomes, CEO of XRP Healthcare, highlighted the immense potential within Uganda‚Äôs fragmented pharmaceutical landscape. By integrating Pharma Ville, XRP Healthcare aims to improve access to essential medicines and optimize healthcare delivery. Laban Roomes, COO of XRP Healthcare, noted that significant groundwork has been laid in Uganda to develop the legal and operational frameworks necessary to scale this business effectively, ensuring long-term improvements in healthcare accessibility. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Operational Enhancements and Future Plans With this acquisition, XRP Healthcare plans to implement immediate operational enhancements to align Pharma Ville with its vision for innovation and healthcare excellence. These upgrades will include advanced inventory management to optimize supply chains, upgraded licensing to expand product offerings, enhanced distribution channels for a wider reach, digital payment integration for seamless transactions, and new Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems to improve customer engagement. By the fourth quarter, Pharma Ville will officially rebrand as XRP Healthcare, reflecting the company‚Äôs commitment to healthcare excellence and its mission to modernize pharmaceutical distribution across Africa. This rebranding effort will not only align the company with XRP Healthcare‚Äôs global vision but also position it as a key player in the continent‚Äôs evolving healthcare landscape. Implications for Uganda‚Äôs Healthcare Sector The acquisition holds significant implications for Uganda‚Äôs healthcare sector. It is expected to strengthen the industry by fostering economic growth and introducing essential technologies. Peter Waiswa, a strategic advisor to UNICEF, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, and now XRP Healthcare, emphasized the importance of this development, noting that the acquisition not only strengthens Uganda‚Äôs healthcare infrastructure but also introduces critical innovations that will improve accessibility and affordability. XRP Healthcare‚Äôs acquisition of Pharma Ville marks a strategic expansion into Africa‚Äôs healthcare industry, reinforcing its commitment to improving healthcare accessibility and efficiency. By integrating digital innovation with traditional pharmaceutical distribution, XRP Healthcare is positioning itself at the forefront of healthcare transformation in emerging markets. The company‚Äôs entry into Uganda is expected to set a precedent for future expansions, creating a more interconnected and efficient pharmaceutical supply chain across Africa. title: Mercuryo introduces on-ramp services to Wallet in Telegram to promote mass crypto adoption
body: Mercuryo , a global payment infrastructure and cryptocurrency platform, has announced the launch of on-ramp services for Wallet in Telegram, the Telegram -integrated crypto management solution, as reported to Finbold on Thursday, March 13. The partnership is designed to promote mass cryptocurrency adoption and, according to Petr Kozyakov, Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) at Mercuryo, help ‚Äúonboard millions of new users to cryptocurrency services.‚Äù üí°¬†Buy Crypto with Mercuryo on @wallet_tg in Telegram! Now millions of Wallet users can buy BTC, TON, and more, directly in @telegram with Wallet, built on @ton_blockchain . üí≥¬†Easy Access ‚Äì Purchase crypto using your local currency via debit/credit card, Google Pay, or Apple‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7VE1lne5C4 ‚Äî Mercuryo (@Mercuryo_io) March 11, 2025 Toward more accessible crypto payments As the leading custodial wallet on Telegram, Wallet plays an important role in the democratization of cryptocurrency payments, already supporting Bitcoin ( BTC ), other stablecoins , and Toncoin ( TON ), the native token on The Open Network (TON), Telegram‚Äôs own Layer-1 ( L1 ) chain. With Mercuryo‚Äôs focus on user experience and features allowing users to convert fiat into digital currencies, the new partnership is set to ensure a more intuitive experience for newcomers to the crypto market . Users can now also purchase crypto using their local currency via debit and credit cards , as well as payment solutions such as Google Pay and Apple Pay , without leaving Telegram. Andrew Rogozov, CEO of Wallet in Telegram, commented on the long-term nature of the Mercuryo integration, stating: ‚ÄúWallet‚Äôs commitment to mass adoption has always been reflected in the long-term thinking behind our strategy. However, up until now, high on-ramp fees have been a significant barrier for people who want to start using crypto. This in turn slows down adoption. Our new partnership with Mercuryo and the new approach to on-ramping changes this.‚Äù With Wallet offering access to BTC, TON, and Jettons, and Mercuryo supporting multiple fiat currencies, the collaboration will simplify crypto transactions and provide users worldwide with a more cost-effective payment solution. The post Mercuryo introduces on-ramp services to Wallet in Telegram to promote mass crypto adoption appeared first on Finbold .

title: Bybit CEO on ‚Äòbrutal‚Äô $4M Hyperliquid loss: Lower leverage as positions grow
body: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou commented on a recent $4 million loss suffered by decentralized exchange (DEX) Hyperliquid due to an Ether whale‚Äôs high-leverage trade, noting that centralized exchanges (CEXs) face similar challenges. On March 12, a crypto investor walked away with $1.8 million and forced the Hyperliquidity Pool (HLP) to bear a $4 million loss after a trade that used leverage on the Hyperliquid decentralized exchange (DEX). The trader used about 50x leverage to turn $10 million into a $270 million Ether ( ETH ) long position. However, the trader couldn‚Äôt exit without tanking their own position. Instead, they withdrew collateral, offloading assets without triggering a self-inflicted price drop, leaving Hyperliquid to cover the losses. Smart contract auditor Three Sigma said the trade was a ‚Äúbrutal game of liquidity mechanics,‚Äù not a bug or an exploit. Hyperliquid also clarified that this was not a protocol exploit or a hack. Source: Hyperliquid Hyperliquid lowers leverage trading for BTC and ETH In response to the trade, Hyperliquid lowered its Bitcoin ( BTC ) leverage to 40x and its ETH leverage allowance to 25x. This increases the maintenance margin requirements for larger positions on the DEX. ‚ÄúThis will provide a better buffer for backstop liquidations of larger positions,‚Äù Hyperliquid stated. In an X post, the Bybit CEO commented on the trade, saying that CEXs are also subjected to the same situation. Zhou said their liquidation engine takes over whale positions when they get liquidated. While lowering the leverage may be an effective solution, Zhou said this could be bad for business: ‚ÄúI see that HP has already lowered their overall leverage; that‚Äôs one way to do it and probably the most effective one, however, this will hurt business as users would want higher leverage.‚Äù Zhou suggested a more dynamic risk limit mechanism that reduces the overall leverage as the position grows. The executive said that in a centralized platform, the whale would go down to a leverage of 1.5x with the huge amount of open positions. Despite this, the executive recognized that users could still use multiple accounts to achieve the same results. The Bybit CEO added that even the lowered leverage capabilities could still be ‚Äúabused‚Äù unless the DEX implements risk management measures such as surveillance and monitoring to spot ‚Äúmarket manipulators‚Äù on the same level as a CEX. Related: Crypto trader gets sandwich attacked in stablecoin swap, loses $215K Hyperliquid sees $166M net outflow Following the liquidation event of the ETH whale and the losses the HLP Vault suffered, the protocol experienced a massive outflow of its assets under management. Dune Analytics data shows that Hyperliquid had a net outflow of $166 million on March 12, the same day as the trade. Magazine: Crypto fans are obsessed with longevity and biohacking: Here‚Äôs why

title: Scandalous Altcoin Waters Are Not Calming Down: Red Notice Requested from Interpol for Its Founder!
body: The LIBRA scandal, which was revealed in February to be fraudulent and whose team is alleged to have ties to Argentine President Javier Milei, continues. LIBRA, which received Milei‚Äôs support, caused many investors to be victimized. While investors received support from the cryptocurrency sector, an Argentinian lawyer requested a red notice from Interpol for the LIBRA token partner. Argentinian lawyer Gregorio Dalbon has requested a global arrest warrant for Hayden Davis, co-creator of the LIBRA token that has caused a political scandal in the country. The lawyer suggested that the LIBRA creator might have obstructed the investigation by leaving the US. Dalbon submitted his request to the prosecutor and judge investigating President Javier Milei‚Äôs connection to the controversial memecoin LIBRA, which reached a market value of $4.5 billion before its collapse. Dalbon said there was a procedural risk if Davis was not arrested and released because he would have access to large amounts of money that would allow him to flee the United States or go into hiding. ‚ÄúDavis‚Äô actions from LIBRA‚Äôs creation through its collapse and the profits from the founding accounts indicate a possible pattern of behavior aimed at defrauding investors by using his connections to Javier Milei and Karina Milei, high-ranking officials in the Argentine government. Given the magnitude of the scandal and the significant losses suffered by investors, it is clear that Hayden Mark Davis's continued release carries procedural risk. His central role in the creation and promotion of the LIBRA cryptocurrency, combined with the international impact of the case, raises the possibility that he will step in to escape the clutches of justice.‚Äù Argentine President Javier Milei has shared many posts about the Solana (SOL)-based LIBRA token. Milei first shared a promotional tweet about the token from his official account, but after the price of the LIBRA token crashed, he deleted his tweet, claiming that he had no connection with the token. He then retweeted a tweet explaining how to buy LIBRA tokens. *This is not investment advice. title: XRP Trading Against USD Goes Live On Binance-US
body: Binance.US, the American branch of the global cryptocurrency exchange Binance , has announced the launch of the XRP/USD trading pair. This addition allows users to trade XRP directly against the U.S. dollar, making it more accessible and liquid for American traders. Binance.US Expands USD Trading Pairs The introduction of the XRP/USD pair is part of Binance.US‚Äôs broader strategy to expand its offerings of USD trading pairs. The platform now supports over 120 trading pairs, featuring popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), and Dogecoin (DOGE). This expansion provides users with a wide variety of options for trading digital assets against the U.S. dollar. $XRP /USD is now live! Explore 50+ USD trading pairs and counting on https://t.co/AZwoBOgsqS Full list: https://t.co/0POcpMx9cz pic.twitter.com/QByP1KAhHO ‚Äî Binance.US (@BinanceUS) March 12, 2025 Impact on XRP Liquidity and Accessibility The addition of the XRP/USD trading pair is expected to significantly enhance XRP‚Äôs liquidity on the Binance.US platform. By facilitating direct trading between XRP and USD, the platform eliminates the need for intermediary conversions, effectively reducing transaction costs and complexities for users. This move aligns with Binance.US‚Äôs commitment to improving user experience and expanding access to various cryptocurrencies. title: Bitcoin Seller Exhaustion Incoming Sooner Rather Than Later, According to Crypto Analyst ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why
body: A widely followed analyst is leaning bullish on Bitcoin ( BTC ) despite the crypto king hovering more than 20% below the all-time high reached in January. The analyst pseudonymously known as Rekt Capital tells his 542,500 followers on the social media platform X that the heavy selling that Bitcoin has experienced over the past couple of weeks is about to end. ‚ÄúIt has been a seller-dominated market over the past two weeks, with above-average seller volume being a daily occurrence. However, there‚Äôs been declining seller volume over this period. This should contribute to seller exhaustion sooner than later.‚Äù Source: Rekt Capital The pseudonymous analyst further says that Bitcoin could bottom out if the Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator on the weekly time frame maintains a support level that stretches back to early 2024. The RSI, a momentum oscillator used to determine oversold or overbought conditions, is calibrated between 0 and 100 with a reading of or below 30 indicating oversold conditions and a reading of or above 70 suggesting overbought conditions. ‚ÄúThe last few times that Bitcoin dropped into RSI=44 (blue), the price didn‚Äôt bottom right away but was very close to the ultimate bottom. Hold the weekly RSI=44 and the Bitcoin bottom shouldn‚Äôt be far away.‚Äù Source: Rekt Capital The widely followed analyst also says that Bitcoin is forming a bullish divergence on the daily time frame. A bullish divergence occurs when the price forms lower lows while an indicator such as the RSI forms higher highs. According to Rekt Capital, the bullish divergence forming on Bitcoin‚Äôs daily chart is a very early-stage positive sign for the crypto king. Source: Rekt Capital Bitcoin is trading at $84,145 at time of writing.
